entities.name: skiving snackboxes
entities.description: A range of sweets that can make you ill enough to get out of class, but also have a purple half that restores you to full fitness.

entities.name: puking pastilles
entities.description: Double-ended, color-coded chews where eating the orange half makes you throw up and swallowing the purple half restores you to full fitness.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: George's brother who has been developing Skiving Snackboxes with him this summer.

entities.name: george
entities.description: The one who whispered about the effects of Skiving Snackboxes and is George's brother.

entities.name: mrs. weasley
entities.description: A person whose back George is keeping a wary eye on, possibly a teacher or authority figure.

relationships.description: George and Fred are brothers who have been developing Skiving Snackboxes together this summer.
Puking Pastilles is a component of the Skiving Snackboxes product, as mentioned in the conversation between George and Fred.
Fred has been developing Skiving Snackboxes with his brother George this summer, as mentioned in the conversation.
